# Degrees

The Statistics Department at Iowa State University confers 5 graduate degrees.

## Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) in Statistics 

### Requirements

The PhD in Statistics has the following course requirements:
STAT 5000, STAT 5420, STAT 5790, 
STAT 5100, STAT 5430, 
STAT 5200, STAT 6410, 
STAT 6010, and STAT 6420.
